title: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: A warm yummy vegetarian lasagna, ready in 1 hour.
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, marinara sauce, ricotta cheese, spinach, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, garlic
instructions: Layer ingredients in a baking dish, bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

title: Classic Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake for all occasions.
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 tsp vanilla extract
instructions: Mix dry ingredients, add wet ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 35 minutes.

title: Spicy Thai Curry
description: Aromatic and spicy Thai curry with a coconut milk base.
ingredients: Coconut milk, green curry paste, chicken breast, bamboo shoots, bell pepper, basil, fish sauce, sugar
instructions: Cook curry paste in coconut milk, add chicken and vegetables, simmer until cooked.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Simple and fresh salad, perfect for summer days.
ingredients: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
instructions: Layer mozzarella and tomatoes, add basil, drizzle with oil and vinegar.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Tasty and easy-to-make beef tacos for a quick meal.
ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, corn tortillas, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning, assemble tacos with toppings.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with tender chicken, a classic favorite.
ingredients: Fettuccine, chicken breast, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, garlic, butter
instructions: Cook pasta, sauté chicken, make Alfredo sauce, combine.

title: Lemon Garlic Salmon
description: Fresh and zesty salmon dish, ready in under 30 minutes.
ingredients: Salmon fillets, garlic, lemon, butter, parsley
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter, add lemon, pour over salmon, bake.

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist banana bread, great for breakfast or as a snack.
ingredients: Ripe bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, baking soda, vanilla extract
instructions: Mash bananas, mix with wet ingredients, add dry ingredients, bake.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Healthy and trendy avocado toast, perfect for brunch.
ingredients: Sliced bread, ripe avocados, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon, olive oil, salt, pepper, spread on toast.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with rich mushroom flavor, a hearty meal.
ingredients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, chicken broth, Parmesan cheese, onion, garlic, butter
instructions: Sauté mushrooms, onion, garlic, cook rice in broth, add cheese.
